availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Clay county, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Nancy Barrett Hensley. Father of Elizabeth Hensley, Robert B. Hensley, John Hensley, Henry Hensley, James M. Hensley, Janie Hensley, Elitha C. Hensley, Nancy Hensley, Veneta Hensley, Vica Hensley, and Dora Hensley. Married to Margaret Martin Hensley in Clay County, Kentucky, on March 23, 1862. Father of Silas Hensley. Farmer in Clay County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clay County, p. 84.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clay County, Precinct 1, p. 165B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994032, Clay County Births.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 33881.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Clay County Marriages, Film 001904623.
